target_left_database: Use {left_name} as target (sync right structure to left)

confirm_delete_connection: Are you sure you want to delete this connection?
postgresql_driver_not_installed: PostgreSQL driver not installed, please install psycopg2: pip install psycopg2-binary
oracle_driver_not_installed: Oracle driver not installed, please install cx_Oracle: pip install cx_Oracle
sqlserver_driver_not_installed: SQL Server driver not installed, please install pyodbc: pip install pyodbc
mongodb_driver_not_installed: MongoDB driver not installed, please install pymongo: pip install pymongo
db2_driver_not_installed: IBM Db2 driver not installed, please install ibm_db: pip install ibm_db
